text:
@ABC How is it, still only 67% that disapprove of 45pp✳️‘s “handling” of the covid19 crisis?!
One would’ve thought that, natural selection would’ve dwindled down the 23% population of stupids by now. Guess covid19 has claimed the lives of more intelligent people.
